issue.title: [C++] Incorrect string format for Datum with the collection type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10749](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10749). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current format looks like this: `Collection(...`, the right embrace is omitted.

comments.body:
